aboutmaintext: Web developer with a passion for clean and responsive web applications. Currently specializing in Frontend Development at Medieinstitutet, working with React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies.
abouthighlight1: A growing interest in full-stack development - combining frontend with backend projects has become a personal favorite
abouthighlight2: With eight years of experience running my own business in the equine industry, I've built a solid foundation in practical problem-solving and business strategy, skills I now bring into the tech world
abouthighlight3: Background in photography, bringing a trained eye for visual balance, detail, and user-centered design
footerErrorMessage: Failed to send message. Please try again.

fikafinder.title: Fikafinder
fikafinder.description: UX/UI design for a café discovery application. Group project.

raddaResten.title: Rädda Resten
raddaResten.description: UX/UI design for a food waste reduction app. Group project.

packingList.title: The packing list - Frontend
packingList.description: A Progressive Web App created with React and TypeScript that allows users to create and manage packing lists. The app uses local storage and has offline capabilities.

storyshelf.title: Storyshelf - FullStack
storyshelf.description: StoryShelf is a full-stack MEVN web app where users can browse and review books, while admins securely manage users and content through a role-based panel using JWT authentication. Group project.

quiz.title: The Quiz - Frontend
quiz.description: A quiz game with a timer and score tracking. Group project.

api.title: API - Backend
api.description: A RESTful API built with Node.js, Express, and MySQL for managing products and categories in a webshop, featuring full CRUD operations, category-based filtering, and robust validation.

nemo.title: Nemo's Ice Cream - Frontend
nemo.description: Nemo's Ice Cream is a ocean-inspired Vue single-page app that showcases artisanal ice cream flavors with smooth animations and responsive navigation. Group project.

donutShop.title: The Donut shop - Frontend
donutShop.description: One of my first projects - an e-commerce interface with cart functionality and payment integration.
